channel.title: Posts on Hybrid prediction notes
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hybrid prediction notes

item.title: Hydrology meeting notes
item.description: Present … Since last time bugfix submitted to Zongyi Li code updated to pytorch 1.8 (faster) Additional bug: the code is BAD for impossible flows challenge: out-of-distribution predictions are terrible Discussions Next steps References Farkas, Kata, Luke S. Hillary, Shelagh K. Malham, James E. McDonald, and David L. Jones. 2020. “Wastewater and Public Health: The Potential of Wastewater Surveillance for Monitoring COVID-19.

item.title: Hydrology meeting notes
item.description: Present Tao Cui Petra Kuhnert Dan Pagendam David Robertson Dan MacKinlay Since last time Simulation progress Tao and Dan have been working on generic simulations via MODFLOW to match the neural emulator. Plan to get modflow output that includes time-step data, not simply the data from the end of each stress period parse HDS-output to access this from python. Tao has provided scripts for this Notes on Li et al.

item.title: Hydrology meeting notes
item.description: Present Dan Pagendam Tao Cui Dan MacKinlay Since last time Dan M implemented the Li et al. (2020) method, trained it (Navier Stokes version) and tested it on artificial data. Discussions Dan M Questions can we get gradient out of MODFLOW sims? Tao: from alternative version Dan M: I think this is low priority now how close to advection-diffusion are we in groundwater?

item.title: Hydrology meeting notes
item.description: Present Dan MacKinlay Petra Kuhnert Dan Pagendam Since last time Dan M has been reviewing alternative techniques from the literature for non-stationary PDEs Weak formulation Bao et al. (2020); Zang et al. (2020). This is very clever, but does not solve the problem that it is hard to use the “implicit representation” output, and it is hard to see how it could generalise to multiple problems.

item.title: Hydrology meeting notes
item.description: Present Dan Pagendam Tao Cui Dan MacKinlay Since last time Dan M ran a reading group on Physics informed NNs under undertainty (Raissi, Perdikaris, and Karniadakis 2019; Zhang et al. 2019) Consolidated all notes into a repository https://github.com/csiro-mlai/HybridPredictionReview/ Published online at csiro-mlai.github.io/HybridPredictionReview/ Discussions Tao on Ensembling and subspace methods (Siade, Putti, and Yeh 2010; Tonkin and Doherty 2009; White 2018) Next steps Dan M: Non-stationary inference methods investigation, e.
